name: make-js-lib
description: A CLI tool to generate javascript libraries
author: Simon Lagos <simon.lagos.sallhed@gmail.com>

scripts.build-test: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn pack --filename make-js-lib.tgz && cd example && yarn refresh && yarn make-js-lib test-lib && cd test-lib && yarn test && yarn build-test
scripts.build-test-all: yarn clean && yarn build && yarn pack --filename make-js-lib.tgz && cd example && yarn refresh && yarn test-all-use-cases
scripts.check-all: yarn lint && yarn typecheck && yarn validate-ci
scripts.release: yarn clean && yarn audit && yarn build && np --no-tests
